page.title: 06CHESSINGTON ZOO (4)
page.content:
{BREEDING }Very few animals are now taken from the wild, as most zoos (Chessington included) breed from their own stocks. There's a Z00 Federation which arranges 'swops' between zoos, home & abroad, for breeding purposes. This applies to special breeding groups, like the great apes.
BUSINESS
{ENTRANCE FEE: }Â£3.25 or Â£1.85 child {SPECIAL RATES: }OAP's, party bookings {TURNOVER: }650,000 visitors p.a. {BUSIEST DAY: }August Bank Holiday (14,000 to 20,000) {STAFF: }90 permanent 160 summer part-timers {HOURS: }10am - 4.00pm winter 10am - 6.00pm summer
